attributes.action: include more diverse sports in the London Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Olympics throught its history has included a range of new disciplines and lost some of the older ones, for a fully culturally friendly games I propose the inclusion of a range of diverse sports from other nations which will allow a greater number of competitiors and nations to take part. These new disciplines could also be brought in as "showcase" events to allow them to be considered for future games.
